nodes.title: What is Quantum Computing?
nodes.prefix_summary:
## What is Quantum Computing?

Quantum computing is a revolutionary approach to computation that leverages quantum mechanical phenomena.

nodes.title: Qubits
nodes.summary:
#### Qubits
Unlike classical bits, qubits can exist in superposition states.

nodes.title: Entanglement
nodes.summary:
#### Entanglement
Quantum particles can be correlated in ways that classical systems cannot replicate.

nodes.title: Cryptography
nodes.summary:
### Cryptography
Quantum computers could break current encryption methods but also enable quantum-safe cryptography.

nodes.title: Drug Discovery
nodes.summary:
### Drug Discovery
Simulating molecular interactions at quantum level for pharmaceutical research.

nodes.title: Optimization Problems
nodes.summary:
### Optimization Problems
Solving complex optimization challenges in logistics and finance.
